name: The Steering Group on Influenza Vaccination
goal: The Steering Group on Influenza Vaccination is a multi-stakeholder expert group that brings together representatives of healthcare professionals, patient community, academics, and policy-makers that was convened as a response to a need for a coordinated approach to influenza vaccination across Europe. The mission of the Steering Group on Influenza Vaccination is to reduce the burden of influenza in Europe, increase seasonal influenza coverage rates, and therefore improve citizens’ health outcomes and quality of life.
euInitiatives: Developments on vaccination policy and vaccine confidence; Developments on infectious diseases policy and pandemic preparedness; Developments on health promotion and disease prevention; Patients' rights in cross-border healthcare; EU Council Recommendations; EU chronic disease framework
